message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $1000000. I want to assure you that I'm confident in the quality of my products, but I also want to be transparent with you. This product is not one of my best offerings, but it still has some value. I'm willing to take a risk and offer it to you at the full price of $1000000. If you're interested, I'll provide more information about the product's features and specifications. If not, I'll move on to the next one.
